LanguageData.BionicFinger.label: bionic finger
LanguageData.BionicFinger.description: A subtle replacement for a human finger. Those are better than biological ones in almost every way.
LanguageData.BionicToe.label: bionic toe
LanguageData.BionicToe.description: A rather good bionic toe replacement. It transmits electrical impulses to a biogel neural interface that communicates directly with the user's nervous system.
LanguageData.ProstheticFinger.label: prosthetic finger
LanguageData.ProstheticFinger.description: A simple prosthetic finger in case of losing one of them. Slightly distinguishable from the real one.
LanguageData.ProstheticToe.label: prosthetic toe
LanguageData.ProstheticToe.description: The simplest prosthetic for a human toe. It feels occasionally inconvenient.
LanguageData.SimpleFinger.label: simple finger replacement
LanguageData.SimpleFinger.description: A simple solid finger-like rod, makes gripping slightly easier.
LanguageData.SimpleToe.label: simple toe replacement
LanguageData.SimpleToe.description: A simple solid toe-like rod, makes walking slightly easier.
